Name: Phone Seller Simulator
About the game: Dear players, first of all, I would like to state that we are new to the game world and give information about the content of our game and what to do. First of all, in the current state of our game, there are free assets that are both our own and free. If we get good support in the future, we will remove all of them and replace them with original assets. And when it comes to criticism, we are open to all positive or negative criticism without insults. If you come to our Discord Address, we answer all your suggestions or questions within 48 hours at most. Now let's talk about our game. ABOUT THE GAME Dear players, we start as a character in the game, follow a close friend of our character and buy the place specified by him. And after you buy, you start buying phones from the computer and selling them to customers. And of course you can also improve your skills as the day goes on . Some of them now; SELL PHONE SELL MEMORY CARD SELL COVER SAT CAMERA SELL BATTERIES REPAIR TRADE It is . And of course, you will also have to go to the tax office building, which is in the game, from every phone you sell or make a transaction, and pay taxes. With the money you earn, you can improve your place, buy items and get an assistant assistant.
